text:
[Verse]
Golden sky so bright
Colors dance in twilight
Whispers in the night
Everything feels right

[Verse 2]
Waves crash on the shore
Hearts begin to soar
Moments we adore
Couldn't ask for more

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams tonight
Holding on so tight
Stars will soon ignite
Endless as the light

[Verse 3]
Walking hand in hand
Footprints in the sand
Life's a magic land
Together we stand

[Bridge]
Feel the evening breeze
Softly through the trees
Time begins to freeze
Heartbeats never cease

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams tonight
Holding on so tight
Stars will soon ignite
Endless as the light
title: Sunset Dreams
